hw_api->hwstat

(PHP 4, PHP 5 < 5.2.0, PECL hwapi CVS)

hw_api->hwstat — Returns statistics about Hyperwave server

Description

hw_api
hw_api_object hwstat ( array $parameter )

Returns statistics about Hyperwave server.

Parameters

parameter

Return Values
